title: Hollywood’s Secret Inventor
description:
Known as “The Most Beautiful Woman in the World,” movie legend Hedy Lamarr wasn’t just a Hollywood star — she was a scientist. And the invention she dreamed up impacts our world in a way that connects us all. 

Order Marie’s novel about Hedy Lamarr, The Only Woman in the Room, from Amazon, Barnes & Noble, or an independent bookstore near you

Follow Marie Benedict on Instagram, order her novels, and learn more about her work at authormariebenedict.com 

Our Week of Women illustration is by Nina Chhita: @nina.draws.scientists
